name: trackthis-api-client
description: Default trackthis API client for javascript

scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/serial-mocha test/* --sort | tee test-output.txt && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc report --reporter=clover && ! grep -q -oP "\d+\sfailing" test-output.txt && rm test-output.txt || { echo "Test output is located in 'test-output.txt'" ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && mkdir lib && ln -s ../src/index.js lib/node.js && node_modules/.bin/browserify src/wrapper.js -o lib/browser.js && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -o lib/browser.min.js --mangle --compress --  lib/browser.js && cp lib/browser.min.js docs/assets/client.min.js && cp lib/browser.js docs/assets/client.js
